scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:dist && npm run build:exe && npm run format:clis && npm run minify-and-compare
scripts.minify:freeze: node .gnv/web-widgets/minifyFreeze.js && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-script-type-attributes --minify-css true widget.freeze.html -o widget.freeze.html && gzip -9 -c widget.freeze.html > widget.freeze.html.gz
scripts.exe:save: npm run --silent exe:freeze > widget.freeze.html && npm run exe:freeze:dev && sed -i -e 's, type="module",,g' widget.freeze.html
scripts.format:shebangs: if [ -f dist/cli.cjs ]; then sed -i '1i #!/usr/bin/env node' dist/cli.*; fi
scripts.format:clis: npm run format:shebangs && npm run format:executable
scripts.test:exe: if [ -f dist/exe.js ]; then enable-browser-mode dist/exe.js; fi
scripts.size: echo 'Gzipped, NOT inlined:' && (gzip -9 -c widget.freeze.html & gzip -9 -c dist/exe.namespace.js) | wc -c | numfmt --to=iec-i --suffix=B --padding=10
scripts.size-minified: echo 'Gzipped, inlined:' && cat widget.freeze.html.gz | wc -c | numfmt --to=iec-i --suffix=B --padding=10
scripts.minify-and-compare: npm run size && npm run minify:freeze && npm run size-minified
